Hesitates when Paul asks her to close her eyes and follow instructions but eventually complies, showing trust but some uncertainty.

Prepares for an assignation methodically, mirroring Edward's movements, indicating focus and intention.

Manages a complicated phone call situation by handling a call waiting beep and redirecting between callers smoothly.
Keeps track of dates and schedules accurately, correcting Edward on the date of a planned dinner.
Chooses to ignore someone waving a phone at her in the driveway, continuing on her way without engagement.
Appears distracted or hesitant when asked what she is wearing, looking down at her knees before answering Paul.
